/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is adorned with red lanterns that hang from the lampposts, adding a touch of cultural charm to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the greenery of the trees lining the street. In the distance, buildings rise, their architecture hinting at the city's blend of tradition and modernity. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the cityscape.
